{"id":927644079,"question_id":2669,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1680585929,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"38 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/927644079/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Substring With Maximum Cost","memory":"42.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximumCostSubstring(string s, string chars, vector<int>& vals) {\n        int ans, ma, m[129] = {};\n        fill_n(m, 129, 1001);\n        ans = ma = 0;\n        vector<int> v;\n        for(int i = 0; i < chars.size(); i++) m[chars[i]] = vals[i];\n        for(auto c: s){\n            int tmp = 0;\n            if(m[c] == 1001) tmp = c - 'a' + 1;\n            else tmp = m[c];\n            v.push_back(tmp);\n        }\n        //for(int i: v) cout << i << ' '; cout << endl;\n        for(int i: v){\n            ma = max(0, ma + i);\n            ans = max(ma, ans);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-substring-with-maximum-cost","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
